DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning cardiac function patient undergoing cardiac surgery compare control intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Cardiac Function After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: In detail , focus new onset atrial fibrillation , ventricular arrhythmia , myocardial injury , cardiac function . Furthermore , aim investigate underlying pathway RIPC modify perioperative stress response .
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo heart surgery cardiopulmonary bypass Emergency case Myocardial infarction 7 day prior enrollment Ejection fraction le 30 % Inability give inform consent
